alert.note: Alert for Clay; Quitman; Randolph (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 22 at 1:33PM EDT until May 22 at 1:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM EDT/1245 PM CDT/ FOR NORTHEASTERN HENRY...NORTHERN CLAY...WESTERN RANDOLPH AND QUITMAN COUNTIES... At 132 PM EDT/1232 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Georgetown to 6 miles southwest of Cuthbert, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Georgetown, Cuthbert, Bellville, Wire Bridge, Bonapartes Retreat, Standleys Store, Watson Crossroads, Crossroads, Ricks Place, Pecan, Randolph Co A/p, Hatcher, Morris, Jones Crossing, Bethel, Springvale, Cotton Hill, Days Crossroads, Springvale Station and Zetto. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
